item.title: XAMPP for Linux Installation
item.description: XAMPP, an abbreviation for X (Linux or Windows or Mac OS X or Solaris), Apache, MySQL, PHP, Perl, is an application composed of a web service (Apache), a database server (MySQL) and a FTP server (ProFTPD) which is intended for development environment. As mentioned above, XAMPP runs both in Windows and UNIX based operating systems. This chance I will explain how to install XAMPP on Linux operating systems. Here are the specifications I use in this tutorial.
